summary: Team research round 2 completed: corrected BoxG/BoxH constraints analyzed, C2 gap identified as critical obstruction

artifacts.summary: Synthesized research from 2 teammates on corrected constraints and construction approaches

teammate_results.angle: Canonical frame construction with BoxG/BoxH constraints
teammate_results.key_contribution: BoxGContent subset GContent (weaker), C2 gap identification, reflexivity proof, generalized BoxG K, decomposition insight
Confirmed BoxGContent weaker, structural temporal-modal conflict, constraint (3) requires F-witness in witness family

key_findings: BoxGContent subset GContent strictly (WEAKER, not stronger) - via T-axioms
Accessibility relation is NOT transitive (but compositionality via histories suffices)
C3 seed consistency IS provable via generalized BoxG K theorem
CRITICAL GAP: C2 (backward constraint) NOT automatically satisfied by forward Lindenbaum
BoxG decomposes into Box composed with G - existing two-layer architecture may be correct
TruthLemma for ALL families requires forward_F in ALL families including witnesses
recommendations: Investigate Path D: non-constant witness families as histories through CanonicalMCS
Address C2 gap via joint bidirectional construction or separate forward/backward relations
Do NOT use BoxGContent seeds (weaker than GContent)
Do NOT restrict TruthLemma to eval family (user confirmed this is wrong)
